snippet: The announcement adds pressure on China to halt its legal ivory trade, which experts say has helped fuel the highest rate of African elephant poaching in decades.
abstract: Thai Prime Min Yingluck Shinawatra pledges to end nation's ivory trade, responding to growing calls from international wildlife groups desperate to stop slaughter of African elephants; announcement adds pressure on China to halt its legal ivory trade.
lead_paragraph: The announcement adds pressure on China to halt its legal ivory trade, which experts say has helped fuel the highest rate of African elephant poaching in decades.

headline.main: Prime Minister Promises to End Thailand’s Ivory Trade
headline.print_headline: Prime Minister Promises to End Thailand’s Ivory Trade

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species
